page.topic: How to debug an Alpha Anywhere installation
page.description: Four steps for debugging an Alpha Anywhere installation.

step.description: Locate the installation directory. Depending on whether you are trying to debug the IDE or Application Server, the installation directory can be found in the following locations:

item.name: Alpha Anywhere Application Server for IIS
item.description: C:\Program Files (x86)\a5V12 Application Server for IIS

step.description: Supply this file to Alpha Software along with your bug report to bugs@alphasoftware.com
If instructed, you may run the Alpha Anywhere installer from the command line with the /M switch and watch for more information.
